- Version/tag: `3.4.0`
- License: GNU General Public License v3.0 (GPL-3.0)
- License text: `vendor/WEBGAZER_LICENSE.md`

Notes:
- WebGazer uses the webcam and typically requires HTTPS (or localhost) for permission prompts.
- GPL-3.0 has distribution implications. If you ship this interpreter bundle (e.g., to participants), review your compliance obligations.
